details.arabic_diacless: اللٰهم اجعله لنا فرطا، وسلفا، وأجرا
details.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ اجْعَلْهُ لَنَا فَرَطًا، وَسَلَفًا، وَأَجْرًا
details.transliteration: Allaahum-maj'alhu lanaa faratan, wa salafan, wa 'ajran.
details.translations: O Allah, make him for us a precursor, a forerunner and a cause of reward.
details.reference: Al-Hasan (Al-Basri) used to recite Al-Fatihah for a child's funeral and then say this. Al-Bukhari, Kitabul-Jana'iz, p. 65.

pageTitle: Dua for a deceased child at the funeral prayer #3
